DOC.brief_summary: In patients with percutaneous endoscopic gastrostomy (PEG) delayed gastric emptying has been speculated as a cause of aspiration pneumonia. Elemental diet may facilitate gastric emptying in PEG patients as compared with regular liquid enteral nutrients, resulting in the prevention of aspiration pneumonia.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Elemental Diet on Gastric Emptying
DOC.criteria: percutaneous endoscopic gastrostomy patients history of abdominal surgery
